articles.description: Dr Kundan Mehta, pulmonologist at Apollo Clinic Pune, in a statement issued on Thursday, said, “Out of 100 post-Covid patients, including asymptomatic ones, approximately 15% present with post-Covid weakness, whereas 7% show signs of lung fibrosis (scarring o…
articles.content: At a Covid-19 testing centre in Pune. (Express file photo by Arul Horizon)After recovering from Covid-19, it is imperative for patients to watch out for red flags and stick to a healthy lifestyle. Ho… [+1455 chars]

articles.author: Press Trust of India | Posted by Srivatsan K C
articles.title: No fresh Covid-19 fatality in Puducherry; UT reports only 16 new cases - Hindustan Times
articles.description: In a welcome development, no fresh fatality was reported for the eighth day in succession on Friday, a release from the Director of Health and Family Welfare S Mohan Kumar said.
articles.content:
The union territory of Puducherry registered 16 fresh Covid-19 cases on Friday taking the overall tally to 36,856, a top Health department official said.
